text: Robert A. "Bob" Roe (February 28, 1924 â€“ July 15, 2014) was an American Democratic Party politician. He represented New Jersey in the United States House of Representatives for over twenty-three years. He served from November 4, 1969 to January 3, 1993. He was also Mayor of Wayne, New Jersey. Roe died at the age of 90 on July 15, 2014.Notice of death of Robert Roe, northjersey.com; accessed July 15, 2014. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American mayors Category:United States representatives from New Jersey Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Robert A. Roe
